From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2023 film directed by Sarim Momin


AseqOfficial release posterDirected bySarim MominWritten byGauri KarnikSarim MominProduced byJyoti DeshpandeMohaan NadaarStarring
Vardhan Puri
Sonnalli Seygall
Siddhanth Kapoor
CinematographyNaren GediaaEdited byShaju ChandranMusic byYug BhusalProductioncompaniesJio StudiosStone Circle ProductionsThe Production HeadquartersDistributed byJioCinemaRelease date
23 June 2023 (2023-06-23)
Running time107 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Aseq is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language Horror thriller written and directed by Sarim Momin. Produced under the banner of Jio Studios, it features Vardhan Puri, Sonnalli Seygall and Siddhanth Kapoor.[1] It was released for streaming on 23 June 2023 in JioCinema.


Plot[edit]
This article needs a plot summary. Please add one in your own words. (September 2023) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
Cast[edit]
Vardhan Puri as Ronnie
Sonnalli Seygall as Lail
Siddhanth Kapoor as Sarim[2]
Elena Fernandes as Priyanka
Adi Chugh as Aadi
Emma Kaler
Julian Gillard
Production[edit]
The film was announced by Jio Studios featuring Vardhan Puri, Sonnalli Seygall and Siddhanth Kapoor.[1] The principal photography of the film started in 2022 and was wrapped in 2023.[3] The film's trailer was released on 21 June 2023.[4]

Soundtrack[edit]
AseqSoundtrack album by Veer Pandya and Yug BhusalReleased2023GenreFeature film soundtrackLength9:02LanguageHindiLabelTimes Music
The film's music is composed by Veer Pandya and Yug Bhusal.[5]
